## hourNativiaToHour() function

Transform a navitia date to a moment object (format: HHmmss to HH:mm:ss)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function hourNativiaToHour(data: string, PassError?: boolean): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | string | The navitia date |
|  PassError | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, return null instead of throwing an error |

**Returns:**

string
